## Quick Start

### Building Reports Locally

```bash
cd MultistateModelsTests/reports
quarto render
```

### Running Tests and Recording Results

```bash
# Run full test suite with automatic cache recording
julia --project=. -e 'using MultistateModelsTests; MultistateModelsTests.runtests()'

# Or run with the dedicated script
julia --project=. scripts/run_all_tests.jl
```

Test results are automatically cached when running via `runtests()`.

### Checking Cache Status

```bash
julia --project=. scripts/refresh_cache.jl
```
